hanzi-su-wiki:
搾

Значения

Выжимать, выдавливать

Мнемоника

Справа — быстро, т.е. внезапно 乍 для других копать себе нору 穴 в значении «узкий» (потом её можно расширить). В целом — выдавливать содержимое кишок, постепенно суживая пальцы рук 扌.

Варианты

榨
purpleculture_pinyin:
zhà
oppress; to extract
угнетать; извлекать
rtega_mnemonic:
榨榨RS
搾搾		扠crush with the hand, press, squeeze, extract
  • hand 扌 squeezing an orange with a wooden 木 device, the juice exists through a narrow 窄 opening
heisig_constituent: squeeze, finger, fingers, tight, hole, house, human legs, saw
koohiiStory1: You have trouble squeezing your hand through the hole so you use a saw to enlarge it.
koohiiStory2: (Thanks DrJones) You squeeze the teats of the cow with your fingers but it´s your first try and you don´t have any milk come through the holes, so you take a saw and cut the teats to make bigger holes. Poor cow, this story squeezes my heart.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you want to fit your fingers into a key hole, you have to squeeze them in. Fingers aren't exactly supposed to fit in key holes... they're for keys, after all. But you want to squeeze your finger on in there anyway to unlock the door.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine what it would be like to squeeze your fingers into a keyhole. Maybe try squeezing one finger really tight first. Did that hurt? Well it's going to be a lot worse in that key hole.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Once you've squeezed your finger in the key hole to unlock this door you squeeze all the money and jewels and treasures you can fit into your sack (さく). Your stealing sack.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You have the ability to squeeze your fingers into locks to open them, so of course you're stealing. And you squeeze those stolen goodies into your sack so you can take them with you.
Ru_Radicals: ｜, ノ, 儿 (ножки), 宀 (значок У), 扎, 穴 (дыра)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the hand (扌) makes narrow (窄) = squeezes

zhà
вм. 榨
Radicals: 扌, 穴, 乍  (fingers, hole, key)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you want to fit your fingers into a key hole, you have to squeeze them in. Fingers aren't exactly supposed to fit in key holes... they're for keys, after all. But you want to squeeze your finger on in there anyway to unlock the door.
Imagine what it would be like to squeeze your fingers into a keyhole. Maybe try squeezing one finger really tight first. Did that hurt? Well it's going to be a lot worse in that key hole.
Reading Mnemonic
Once you've squeezed your finger in the key hole to unlock this door you squeeze all the money and jewels and treasures you can fit into your sack (さく). Your stealing sack.
You have the ability to squeeze your fingers into locks to open them, so of course you're stealing. And you squeeze those stolen goodies into your sack so you can take them with you.
